description: This file defines the interface for the CCSP WiFi Agent's message bus interactions, including function declarations for message engagement, initialization, finalization, resource management, signaling, and DBus message handling specific to the WiFi component.

methods.name: ssp_WifiMbi_MessageBusEngage
methods.description: Engages the message bus for the WiFi component with specified identifiers and configuration.

methods.name: ssp_WifiMbi_Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the WiFi message bus interface with user data.

methods.name: ssp_WifiMbi_Finalize
methods.description: Finalizes and releases resources associated with the WiFi message bus interface.

methods.name: ssp_WifiMbi_Buscheck
methods.description: Performs a check on the message bus status.

methods.name: ssp_WifiMbi_FreeResources
methods.description: Frees resources with specified priority for the WiFi message bus.

methods.name: ssp_WifiMbi_SendParameterValueChangeSignal
methods.description: Sends a signal indicating that a parameter's value has changed.

methods.name: ssp_WifiMbi_SendTransferCompleteSignal
methods.description: Sends a signal indicating a transfer is complete.

methods.name: CcspPandM_path_message_func
methods.description: Handles incoming DBus messages related to the Path by invoking the appropriate callback.

methods.name: ssp_WifiMbi_RegisterToCR
methods.description: Registers the WiFi component with the Configuration Registry.

methods.name: waitConditionReady
methods.description: Waits until a specified condition on the message bus is ready before proceeding.
